Articles.Content:
I was just wondering, does 0.15 use the same persistence format as 0.14? And does 0.17 use the same format as 0.16?

If anyone could provide something like a timeline, it would be appreciated.
I'm pretty sure it changes. Almost every major version.

Almost every major version except KSP 0.19 and its following, KSP 0.19.1, because the persistent file used in 0.18 or later is compatible to the latest version of the game.

EDIT: Sorry to make necro changes to the thread but apparently KSP 0.20 and the counterparts support the saves. The next version will not, however.

Edited July 4, 2013 by Designer225
